short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your job search and send professional cover letters in just a few clicks with Lettermate's chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of spending hours crafting the perfect cover letter for each job application? Lettermate makes it easy to create professional, tailored cover letters in just a few clicks.

With our chrome extension, you can select a rich text on any job board and generate a personalized letter that showcases your skills and experience. You can customize and edit your letters to fit each specific job you're applying for, and easily send your finished letters with the click of a button.

Lettermate streamlines your job search and helps you stand out from the competition. With our chrome extension, you can save time and stress on cover letter writing and focus on finding your dream job.

Try Lettermate today and take the first step towards landing your dream job.
